name: The Crypts
description:
You are a holy warrior called to cleanse the catacombs/crypts of the church. You fight through monsters and undead going further and further down until you reach the bottom, or so you think.

Distinct modes of gameplay:

  • Players fight undead monsters and go down from room to room
  • Players grow stronger, the further they descend into the crypts

Controls:

Player movement: WASD or arrowkeys

Interact with levers, chests, doors: E

Use health potoin: Q

Attack: Spacebar
